languages.text: {n}Зрелище тела, превращенного в придаток к древнему механизму, вызывает омерзение. Словно сонм гигантских металлических насекомых облепил плоть и сосет из нее жизненные соки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Зрелище тела, превращенного в придаток к древнему механизму, вызывает омерзение. Словно сонм гигантских металлических насекомых облепил плоть и сосет из нее жизненные соки.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to some ancient mechanism is sickening. It is like hundreds of giant metallic insects have swarmed the flesh and are leeching the vitality from it.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Зрелище тела, превращенного в придаток к древнему механизму, вызывает омерзение. Словно сонм гигантских металлических насекомых облепил плоть и сосет из нее жизненные соки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The sight of a body turned into an appendage to some ancient mechanism is sickening. It is like hundreds of giant metallic insects have swarmed the flesh and are leeching the vitality from it.{/n}
{n}The sight of a body turned into an appendage to some ancient mechanism is sickening. It is like hundreds of giant metallic insects have swarmed the flesh and are leeching the vitality from it.{/n}

{n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to some ancient mechanism is sickening. It is like hundreds of giant metallic insects have swarmed the flesh and are leeching the vitality from it.{/n}

{n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to some ancient mechanism is sickening. It is like hundreds of giant metallic insects have swarmed the flesh and are leeching the vitality from it.{/n}

{n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to some ancient mechanism is sickening. It is like hundreds of giant metallic insects have swarmed the flesh and are leeching the vitality from it.{/n}

languages.text: {n}光是看到肉体变成了古老的机械，就让你感觉几欲作呕。这一幕仿佛几百只硕大的金属昆虫蜂拥而至，从肉体中吸收营养。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to some ancient mechanism is sickening. It is like hundreds of giant metallic insects have swarmed the flesh and are leeching the vitality from it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}光是看到肉体变成了古老的机械，就让你感觉几欲作呕。这一幕仿佛几百只硕大的金属昆虫蜂拥而至，从肉体中吸收营养。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ver un cuerpo transformado en apéndice de un mecanismo antiguo es algo nauseabundo. Es como si cientos de insectos metálicos cubrieran la carne y absorbieran su vitalidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to some ancient mechanism is sickening. It is like hundreds of giant metallic insects have swarmed the flesh and are leeching the vitality from it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ver un cuerpo transformado en apéndice de un mecanismo antiguo es algo nauseabundo. Es como si cientos de insectos metálicos cubrieran la carne y absorbieran su vitalidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}古代の機械の付属品と化した肉体の姿は不気味の一言だった。まるで何百匹もの巨大な金属虫が肉体に群がり、生命力を奪っているかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to some ancient mechanism is sickening. It is like hundreds of giant metallic insects have swarmed the flesh and are leeching the vitality from it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}古代の機械の付属品と化した肉体の姿は不気味の一言だった。まるで何百匹もの巨大な金属虫が肉体に群がり、生命力を奪っているかのようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es ist ein widerwärtiger Anblick: Ein Körper, der zu einem Anhängsel irgendeines uralten Mechanismus umgewandelt wurde. Es ist, als wären hunderte von gigantischen metallischen Insekten über das Fleisch hergefallen und würden ihm die Lebenskraft entziehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to some ancient mechanism is sickening. It is like hundreds of giant metallic insects have swarmed the flesh and are leeching the vitality from it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist ein widerwärtiger Anblick: Ein Körper, der zu einem Anhängsel irgendeines uralten Mechanismus umgewandelt wurde. Es ist, als wären hunderte von gigantischen metallischen Insekten über das Fleisch hergefallen und würden ihm die Lebenskraft entziehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous êtes {mf|frappé|frappée} de dégoût à la vue de ce corps transformé en appendice d'un mécanisme ancien, comme si des centaines d'énormes insectes métalliques avaient envahi cette chair pour en aspirer toute la vitalité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to some ancient mechanism is sickening. It is like hundreds of giant metallic insects have swarmed the flesh and are leeching the vitality from it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous êtes {mf|frappé|frappée} de dégoût à la vue de ce corps transformé en appendice d'un mécanisme ancien, comme si des centaines d'énormes insectes métalliques avaient envahi cette chair pour en aspirer toute la vitalité.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eklentiler takılarak kadim bir mekanizmaya dönüştürülen bedenin görüntüsü mide bulandırıyor. Âdeta yüzlerce dev metalik böcek, ete hücum etmiş ve onun bütün canlılığını emiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a body transformed into an appendage to some ancient mechanism is sickening. It is like hundreds of giant metallic insects have swarmed the flesh and are leeching the vitality from it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eklentiler takılarak kadim bir mekanizmaya dönüştürülen bedenin görüntüsü mide bulandırıcı. Âdeta yüzlerce dev metalik böcek ete hücum etmiş ve onun bütün canlılığını emiyormuş gibi.{/n}
